jobTitle: Remote Sales Positions: Work Where You Want, When You Want
description:
Join Our Dynamic Team and Elevate Your Career!

Are you eager to seize an extraordinary opportunity with our rapidly expanding company? We're amid unparalleled growth, with a constant stream of client inquiries flooding in daily. Recognized as one of Inc. 5000's fastest-growing companies for six consecutive years and recently highlighted in Forbes, we're on an upward trajectory like no other.

If you're driven, ambitious, and a self-starter, this is your chance to achieve remarkable career advancement. We prioritize fast learners who are ready to hit the ground running in our rigorous training process.

Our first-year Sales Agents, following our streamlined sales approach, consistently earn over $150,000 annually. By the second and third year, earnings stabilize between $250,000 to $300,000. Imagine earning a six-figure income or more, all while working comfortably from home.

About the Role:

Our Sales Agents conduct business entirely online or over the phone with clients across the nation seeking insurance coverage. They engage with clients, gather essential information to assess their needs, schedule virtual appointments, and conduct thorough product presentations (via Zoom or phone calls). Our products offer instant approval, and our commission payouts are typically processed within 72 hours.

We Seek Candidates Who:

  • Are you a natural "people person"? Do you excel in building rapport with oth
  • Can you thrive independently? We empower our team members and foster auton
  • Are you positive and enthusiastic? We cultivate a supportive environment where optimism is valued

If you believe you're the right fit, apply with your resume today, and we'll promptly arrange an interview to discuss further.

Benefits You'll Enjoy:

Joining our team isn't just about a job—it's about gaining access to comprehensive benefits like life insurance coverage and our extensive healthcare exchange, which includes medical, dental, and vision plans. Additionally, you'll have the opportunity to qualify for all-expenses-paid incentive trips as a reward for your dedication and success.

DISCLAIMER:

This position is a 1099 independent contractor commission-based sales role. We believe in limitless earning potential and do not impose any caps on your income.

PLEASE NOTE:

We only consider domestic candidates for this position.
